entries.meaning: (chemistry) Containing uranium in higher valences than uranous compounds.
(rare, historical) Of, related to, or characteristic of male same-sex erotic desire and relationships; homosexual.
examples: From many other places in the classics the impression may be won that Uranic love attained a higher position even than her sister. More recent explanations of the homosexual instinct have emanated from philosophers, psychologists and natural scientists.
